name: Trade Around
description:
The denizens of this forest need some help. Talk to everyone to determine what they want... then trade it to them!

How To Play

  • Click nearby ground to walk there.
  • Run up to people or items that you find to learn more.
  • Check inside your pack with the button.

This is a retro game designed for relaxation. Take in the sights and sounds of the forest, and try to puzzle out who wants which trinkets. 🍰 A fun, free treat from A.V. Knights, inspired by the trading quests of the LoZ series.

If you enjoy Trade Around, please consider supporting A.V. Knights! :-D  You can make a donation here on itch, or buy us a coffee.☕️ A.V. Knights is a small studio, and your shares and likes online are really helpful too! Thanks for spending time with us today!

Credits

Lead designer & programmer: Nathan Pasko @AVknights_dev
Music composed by Mark Mara, arranged by Nathan P.
Some fonts by Chevy Ray @chevyray
